verses.name: Ezekiel 42:7
verses.text: And the wall that was without over against the chambers, toward the utter court on the forepart of the chambers, the length thereof was fifty cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:8
verses.text: For the length of the chambers that were in the utter court was fifty cubits: and, lo, before the temple were an hundred cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:9
verses.text: And from under these chambers was the entry on the east side, as one goeth into them from the utter court.

verses.name: Ezekiel 42:10
verses.text: The chambers were in the thickness of the wall of the court toward the east, over against the separate place, and over against the building.
